info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:40PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Fergus County through 215 PM MDT... At 135 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Grass Range to 9 miles south of Lewistown. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding and Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Moore, Giltedge, Glengarry, Heath and Forestgrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
